summary: Diff implements password-parameterized frontend hooks and Owner Panel views for recruiter visits, visitor messages, content updates, and skills actions. Backend shows introduction of an `ownerPassword = "BirdOnTree3"` and a new "Password-gated Owner Panel Methods" section, but the relevant backend method implementations are truncated, so full backend compliance cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained "secret messages" React Query hooks and related placeholder behavior despite not being part of the BuildRequest to fix Owner Panel authorization via password-gated methods.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on password-gating Owner Panel operations for recruiter visits, visitor messages, content updates, and skills; it does not request secret-messages functionality or related hooks.
